EmailTemplate.description: 2 - Sent to Branch Chief after submission
EmailTemplate.name: GAS Order Approval Request
EmailTemplate.subject: A New Gas Products Order for {!Order_Request__c.OwnerLastName}, {!Order_Request__c.OwnerFirstName} has been submitted for your review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
A New Gas Products Order has been submitted by {!Order_Request__c.OwnerLastName}, {!Order_Request__c.OwnerFirstName} and is ready for Branch Chief review. Please review this Order for content and upon completing your review, press the Branch Chief Approval button next to your name.
Please note that if this order has not been approved at least four business days prior to the requested delivery date, delivery may be delayed.
To access this new order, double-click this DocLink: {!ApprovalRequest.External_URL}
Thank You.
